title: How can I get rid of a hacker named Richard Poland
content: His name is Richard Poland idiot made an email in my account and used his name if it sounds familiar his a guy that approaches you and tries to get you to invest in bitcoin on the social media app telegram he's a real piece of work this asshole is and now I have most of his apps put in a deep sleep now I'll go give his computer a raspberry 😀 😉 👍 😴 😜 😄 😀
